page.title: 06Wetwang,Farm Animals
page.content: Most of the farms near Wetwang keep small herds of animals.The animals are mainly grazed on the land where crops can't be grown because the land is not rich enough. There are several flocks of sheep and a few herds of beef cattle.Cattle for meat are not turned out so often because they don't fatten. Most of the farms keep a few hens for white meat and eggs. Dogs and cats are usually kept to keep the mice and rats down to an acceptable level.Ferrets are sometimes kept to keep the wild rabbits down to an acceptable level. There is alot of wildlife in Wetwang and around Wetwang.If you are lucky when you go on a walk you will see some hares.
